text:
Four Seasons Resort Marrakech Introduces New Golf Experience
Ideal for golf enthusiasts and amateurs willing to perfect their swing, Four Seasons Resort Marrakech invites guests to make the most of their stay in settings that will inspire them to play their best. Located only 15 minutes away from Marrakech’s three most spectacular golf courses, enjoy a leisurely round at each of Assoufid Golf Club, Samanah Country Club and Royal Golf of Marrakech.
Golfers can challenge themselves at the unique desert-designed championship course at Samanah Country Club offering first class facilities, play another round at Assoufid Golf Club, and end the stay like a legend in playing at Royal Golf of Marrakech, which has attracted international players since 1933.
After an intense play, indulge in the best “19th holes” of Marrakech. Retreat in the Resort and unwind in the world-class Spa or cool down with a refreshing cocktail around the two oversized pools. For the curious ones, the Resort is just minutes away from the fascinating Medina and the modern Gueliz district, where one can embrace all that Marrakech has to offer, from the labyrinth of the souks to the wonders of Jemma el-Fnaa or fine culinary delights.
More than just a golf break, it’s an opportunity to treat oneself to a relaxing and peaceful journey, a vibrant cultural change of scene and exclusive Four Seasons service, giving golf lovers a chance to spend most of their time on the course.
The Marrakech Golf Package requires a four-night minimum stay, and is available as of September 1, 2015 with rates starting at EUR 410 per night for two guests, including the following:
Luxurious accommodations with relaxing views
18 holes green fees at Assoufid, Samanah Country Club and Royal Golf of Marrakech
Round trip transfer to each golf course
Complimentary golf material polishing
Buffet breakfast served in Solano restaurant
20 percent savings on Spa treatments
Source:-Four Seasons
